attributes.action: KEEP BRITAIN TIDY & PICK UP LITTER
attributes.additional_details: This is a national disgrace! Which ever part of the country you are in, it is inevitable that you will see litter; some areas worse than others.The government needs to reinforce fines for discarding litter and bring back the Keep Britain Tidy campaign.
attributes.background: There is so much litter and rubbish in our roads and countryside! As a volunteer who walks around my local town picking up litter, I am always astounded at the amount of rubbish lying around....cigarette boxes, vape boxes, sweet wrapping, cans. It's disgusting!

departments.name: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

rejection.details:
We understand that you are concerned about litter, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. There are already fines for littering. Enforcing these is a matter for local authorities, the police and the courts, not the Government or Parliament.

We can't accept petitions calling on the Government to support particular charities, but could accept a petition calling on the Government to increase funding for schemes aimed at tackling litter.
